text: You might have heard Hailey Baldwin ’ s name over the years. Perhaps it was as the youngest daughter of actor Stephen Baldwin. Perhaps it was as the best friend of model Kendall Jenner. Or perhaps it was as the recently engaged fiancée of Justin Bieber. However you learned of Baldwin ’ s name, one detail is clear : She ’ s more than someone else ’ s accessory. In her time in the spotlight, the 21 - year - old has built an established résumé, and she ’ s only going up from here.
